items.title: Clone & configure

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Need more details? Reach out via Discord or email‚Äîour team is happy to help.

items.title: What‚Äôs included in the template?
items.description: All lunar tools, admin dashboards, authentication, Stripe billing, content structures, AI workflows and i18n building blocks.

items.title: Do I need advanced technical skills?
items.description: Basic TypeScript knowledge is enough. Clear docs, scripts and seeds make the setup straightforward.

items.title: Can I add new tools?
items.description: Yes. The architecture is modular‚Äîduplicate the existing pattern to launch your own lunar features.

items.title: How accurate is the data?
items.description: Astronomical calculations use the Swiss Ephemeris. You can enable caching or plug in alternative sources if needed.

items.title: Do you offer launch support?
items.description: The Pro package includes an onboarding call and premium support. All plans include lifetime updates.
